title: Air Supply - Platinum & Gold Collection (2004)
description:
Australia's Air Supply was hugely popular during the first half of the 1980s, and the band produced a handful of excellent soft-rock hits during these years. Singers Russell Hitchcock and Graham Russell were the founders, and certainly the heart, of the group, and together their melodramatic musical vision gave adult-contemporary pop a higher profile.

PLATINUM & GOLD COLLECTION contains 13 of Air Supply's best tracks, including the pleading "All Out of Love," the soaring "Sweet Dreams," and, of course, the sing-along classic "Making Love Out of Nothing at All." This PLATINUM & GOLD COLLECTION also presents the epic ballad "I Can Wait Forever" (from the film GHOSTBUSTERS) and some of Air Supply's lesser-known treasures, most notably "Now and Forever," a song that epitomizes the rich melodicism of this vocal duo.
(Source: cduniverse.com)

Original Year: 2004
Genre: Rock/Pop, Rock, Pop

02. Here I Am (Just When I Thought I Was Over You)
